name: Alea Research
title: Jambo Using 99 Phones To Onboard Web3s Next Generation Of Users
text:
Synopsis
Jambo is pioneering crypto adoption in emerging markets by offering an affordable $99 smartphone and ecosystem designed to onboard billions of unbanked and unconnected individuals to Web3 technologies.

Key Insights
- Targets 3 billion people without smartphone access and 1.4 billion unbanked globally, focusing on emerging markets
- Already sold 700,000 phones and onboarded 8 million wallets across 120+ countries
- Launched $J token on January 22, 2025, listed on major exchanges including OKX, Bybit, and Kucoin
- Backed by top-tier investors including Paradigm, Pantera, Coinbase, and OKX, with $40M raised and $500M valuation
- Ecosystem includes JamboPhone ($99) and JamboApp, providing crypto-native experience with earning opportunities, multi-chain support, and decentralized application marketplace
- Token economics designed to drive adoption through quest-based earning, partner rewards, and asset staking
- Strategic goal is to democratize financial access and create low-cost solutions for payments, banking, and digital asset engagement in underserved regions
